title: Enhancing Data Science Practical Skills: Racial Equity-Embedded Online Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics knowledge and basic understanding of the teacher's role
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply mathematics educational materials reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can present at least three online interaction strategies to strengthen cognitive and social presence.
Learners can design mathematics lessons that respect individual learners' experiences and cultural capital.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
